properties.description: Welcome to our community meeting hub! At the heart of our community lies a warm and welcoming space, The Open Door. More than just a place to savour delicious coffee and treats, it's a haven where fellowship and friendship blossom. Whether you're a long-standing member of our congregation or a newcomer seeking a moment of respite, our meeting hub is here to serve you. It's not just about the food and beverages; it's about the sense of belonging. The Open Door is a reflection of our commitment to nurturing a strong, loving community, where everyone is welcomed with open arms.

properties.address: Cottage Square, Leamington Spa CV31 1PT
properties.description:
The Warm and Well Hub is run to support people with cost of living issues and to offer a regular, inclusive and welcoming social outlet for anyone feeling lonely or isolated in the community.

Free lunch and cost of living advice. Games for anyone not wanting to engage in the cost of living activity including short mat bowls, table tennis and board games. Guest speakers and activities.

Call 01926 422071 or email wellbeing@sydni.org to register (20 spaces weekly)

www.facebook.com/TheSydniCentre
properties.title: Sydni Centre Warm and Well Hub

properties.description:
Coffee Morning ‚Äì Drop in for a free relaxed monthly coffee morning for adults, first Wednesday of every month. Occasional talks, free refreshments, and the opportunity to chat with old friends and new.

The library is open to all, Monday ‚Äì Friday 8am ‚Äì 5.30pm (5pm on Fridays) and Saturdays 9am ‚Äì 4pm. It is a warm, safe space with access to free wifi and a range of activities and resources. It is free to join the library, and for library members to borrow books and use a computer or tablet on site.
